name: ChangeVehiclePaintjob
description: Change a vehicle's paintjob (for plain colors see ChangeVehicleColor).

params_body.name: vehicleid
params_body.description: The ID of the vehicle to change the paintjob of.

params_body.name: paintjobid
params_body.description: The ID of the Paintjob to apply. Use 3 to remove a paintjob.

return_values: This function always returns 1 (success), even if the vehicle passed is not created.
pawn_code:
new rand = random(3); // Will either be 0 1 or 2 (all valid)
ChangeVehiclePaintjob(GetPlayerVehicleID(playerid), rand); // changes the paintjob of the player's current vehicle to a random one
related_fn:
ChangeVehicleColor: Set the color of a vehicle.
 OnVehiclePaintjob: Called when a vehicle's paintjob is changed.
related_cb: OnVehiclePaintjob: Called when a vehicle's paintjob is changed.
